SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, JISA_NAME AS jisaName, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo FROM ( SELECT JISA_CODE, ( SELECT NAME FROM ATMS_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CD = 'JISA_CODE' AND CODE = JISA_CODE ) AS JISA_NAME, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, TERMINAL_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY JISA_CODE,BRANCH_CODE ORDER BY TERMINAL_NO) AS rnum FROM ATMS_TERMINAL_STATUS )WHERE rnum = 1
AND JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}
